channel.title: A Suggestion
channel.description:
I'm not sure if this is the right spot but I have a suggestion.
Well SCAR dosen't really work that well. And it's not minimizable. But the newer macro is JMacro. You can minimize it and it works welll.
Maybe add a section about it to this website?
I can talk to the owner of JMacro about it if you want too.
(The website for it is www.GetJMacro.com ) I think it just redirects to CheatScene right now. But everything is on CS. ^^I'm not trying to advertise.

item.title: A Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @Kollidierende Kolli`
item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

Oh, I didn’t know it was minimizable.

But have you checked out JMacro?
It’s pretty nice (:

Read full topic

item.title: A Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

SCAR is minimizable and allows multiple autoing using the SMART plugin.

Read full topic
